overview:
Pablos is a futurist, inventor, and notorious hacker with a unique view into both breaking and building new technologies. At Komposite, Pablos is implementing science fiction with invention and design projects that assimilate new technologies. Pablos has created thigh holsters for cell phones. He has also helped to build the world’s smallest PC, while at OQO; spaceships at Blue Origin; and AI agent systems at Xigo.

He is a member of The Shmoo Group of security professionals and helped create the Hackerbot, a robot that finds WiFi users and shows them their own passwords on its screen.
